description:
Family hotel in popular Les Halles near the Louvre

Handy for Les Halles
The family-friendly Novotel Paris Les Halles puts you in the beating heart of Paris, within a 15-minute walk of the Louvre, Pompidou Center, and Notre-Dame Cathedral. To get farther afield, you can hop on the metro or RER light rail system at Châtelet–Les Halles, steps away.

Shop and dine
You can shop in the giant Forum des Halles shopping center right next door, or browse world-class fashion brands like Gucci, Armani, and Prada on Rue Saint-Honoré. You'll find this popular neighborhood is home to plenty of budget-friendly restaurants and bars.

All-day dining
La Place restaurant and bar will keep you fed and watered all day, from a breakfast buffet to afternoon tea in the leafy patio to a cocktail in the bar – with live piano on weekends. Kids are happy with a children's menu and play area. The hotel provides free WiFi in public areas for guests to keep in touch with their friends and family.

Tidy variety
You can choose from tidy, compact rooms or larger suites, all with satellite TVs, and sweet details such as kettles and a selection of herbal infusions. You'll find stronger drinks in the minibar, and can order room service 24/7. Under-16s stay free with parents.

DESCRIPTION.value:
Family hotel in popular Les Halles near the Louvre

Handy for Les Halles
The family-friendly Novotel Paris Les Halles puts you in the beating heart of Paris, within a 15-minute walk of the Louvre, Pompidou Center, and Notre-Dame Cathedral. To get farther afield, you can hop on the metro or RER light rail system at Châtelet–Les Halles, steps away.

Shop and dine
You can shop in the giant Forum des Halles shopping center right next door, or browse world-class fashion brands like Gucci, Armani, and Prada on Rue Saint-Honoré. You'll find this popular neighborhood is home to plenty of budget-friendly restaurants and bars.

All-day dining
La Place restaurant and bar will keep you fed and watered all day, from a breakfast buffet to afternoon tea in the leafy patio to a cocktail in the bar – with live piano on weekends. Kids are happy with a children's menu and play area. The hotel provides free WiFi in public areas for guests to keep in touch with their friends and family.

Tidy variety
You can choose from tidy, compact rooms or larger suites, all with satellite TVs, and sweet details such as kettles and a selection of herbal infusions. You'll find stronger drinks in the minibar, and can order room service 24/7. Under-16s stay free with parents.

HOTEL_AMENITY.value: Hotel Novotel Paris les Halles is the most central 4 star hotel in Paris ! Several metro, train and bus lines are near the hotel to get to the main tourist attractions in Paris in no time. You will find at the hotel all the facilities that you need during your stay such as a restaurant, a bar, a patio, free wireless Internet access in the common areas, and newspapers in the lobby. Baby sitting services are available on request at an additional cost. At the front desk, open 24/7, the multilingual staff is here to help you and guide you: currency exchange, luggage service and advice for your visits. A free fitness center is also accessible 24/7. A public parking is located at 200m from the hotel (discounted rate at front desk).

DINING.value: La Place is a French cuisine restaurant where you can take every meal. The Chef is committed to cook original meals from organic and fair trade products. The restaurant glass roof gives to the place a bright and warming atmosphere. La Place bar proposes a wide range of cocktails in a contemporary space with a piano entertainment every Tuesdays and Thursdays.

RECREATION.value: The recreational activities listed below are available either on site or near the hotel; fees may apply.

CHECK_IN_POLICY.value:
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

NEARBY_POINTS_OF_INTEREST.value:
Forum des Halles - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
Theatre du Chatelet - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Centre Pompidou - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Museum Georges Pompidou - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Pont Neuf - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Sainte Chapelle - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Hotel de Ville - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Palais Royal - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Louvre Museum - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Notre Dame Cathedral - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Comedie-Francaise - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
Paris Bourse - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Pont de l'Archeveche - 1 km / 0.7 mi
Porte Saint-Denis - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Picasso Museum - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi

The closest major airports to Novotel Paris Les Halles are:
Paris (ORY-Orly) - 14.8 km / 9.2 mi
Paris (CDG-Roissy-Charles de Gaulle) - 22.9 km / 14.2 mi

The preferred airport for Novotel Paris Les Halles is Paris (CDG-Roissy-Charles de Gaulle).

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or airport and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 km and mile.

LOCATION_TEASER.value:
City center of Paris
Plenty of tourist attractions nearby the hotel Novotel Paris les Halles: the Marais area, Georges Pompidou center, Notre-Dame, Louvre etc. Business or leisure travelers can enjoy the culture of the city.

NATIONAL_RATING.value: This hotel has received its official star rating from the French Tourism Development Agency, ATOUT France.

KNOW_BEFORE_YOU_GO.value:
• This property offers transfers from the train station (surcharges may apply). Guests must contact the property with arrival details 48 hours prior to arrival, using the contact information on the booking confirmation.
  • A resort fee is included in the total price displayed.

FEES.value:
The following fees and deposits are charged by the property at time of service, check-in, or check-out.


  • Fee for buffet breakfast: EUR 19.75 per person (approximately)
  • Self parking fee: EUR 24 per day
  • Pet fee: EUR 30 per pet, per day

The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change.

MANDATORY_HOTEL_IMPOSED_FEES.value:
You'll be asked to pay the following charges at the hotel:


  • A tax is imposed by the city: EUR 2.48 per person, per night. This tax does not apply to children under 18 years of age.

The charges below are included in your overall room price:

  • Resort fee

We have included all charges provided to us by the property. However, charges can vary, for example, based on length of stay or the room you book.

TAGLINE.value: 4-star hotel with restaurant, near Forum des Halles

HCOM_KEY_FACTS_AT_CHECK_IN.value:
• Credit card or cash deposit required

  • Government-issued photo ID required

HCOM_DINING.value: La Place - This restaurant specializes in French cuisine and serves brunch, lunch, and dinner. Guests can enjoy drinks at the bar.

HCOM_FACILITY_POLICIES.value: Children under 16 years old are not allowed in the fitness facility without adult supervision.

HCOM_SERVICE_POLICIES.value: For transfers, guests must contact the property 48 hours prior to arrival at the number on the booking confirmation.

HCOM_MANDATORY_TAXES.value: • A tax is imposed by the city: EUR 2.48 per person, per night. This tax does not apply to children under 18 years of age.

HCOM_MANDATORY_FEES_IN_BOOKING.value:
The charges below are included in the total price displayed:

  • Resort fee

HCOM_FEES_DINING.value: Buffet breakfast is offered for an extra charge of EUR 19.75 per person (approximately)

HCOM_FEES_TRAVELING_WITH_KIDS.value: Babysitting/childcare is available for an extra charge

HCOM_FEES_TRAVELING_WITH_PETS.value: Pets are allowed for an extra charge of EUR 30 per pet, per day

GOLD.value: If you want a modern, family-friendly hotel in the heart of Paris' Right Bank, Novotel Paris Les Halles ticks all the boxes. The Louvre is within a 10-minute stroll, and other cultural hotspots are easily reached on foot or metro. The leafy patio offers a calm haven amid the neighborhood's bustle, and a breakfast buffet will set you up for the day.

GUESTS_LOVE.value:
Guests Love
  • Terrific location close to sights; easy access to Paris Metro and RER light rail

  • Friendly staff and excellent service

    • Keep in Mind
  • Some noise in this popular area, particularly when construction work is ongoing

  • Rooms are modern but a little bare

  • Some say it's a tight fit for a family of four

END_OF_THE_DAY.value:
At the end of the day…
Our guests love the central location of Novotel Paris Les Halles, close to landmarks and local eateries. For some the rooms felt small, a common trait for the city. Guests say that staff is always helpful.

HOTEL_FEATURE.value:
• 285 guestrooms
  • Restaurant and bar/lounge
  • Breakfast available
  • 24-hour fitness center
  • 8 meeting rooms
  • Train station pick-up service
  • In-room childcare
  • Terrace
  • 24-hour front desk
  • Daily housekeeping
  • Computer station
  • Laundry service
  • Conference space
  • Multilingual staff
  • Concierge services
  • Free newspapers in the lobby
  • Luggage storage
  • Tour/ticket assistance
  • Porter/bellhop
  • TV in a common area

ROOM_FEATURE.value: When you stay at Novotel Paris Les Halles, you'll be in a great location, within just a 10-minute walk of Forum des Halles and Museum Georges Pompidou. Guests can visit the 24-hour fitness center for a workout or grab a bite to eat at La Place, which serves French cuisine and is open for lunch and dinner. A bar/lounge and a terrace are other highlights, and rooms at this upscale hotel offer LED TVs and minibars.

LOCATION_SECTION.value:
• Heart of Paris
  • Forum des Halles (0.1 mi / 0.2 km)
  • Museum Georges Pompidou (0.3 mi / 0.5 km)
  • Pont Neuf (0.4 mi / 0.7 km)
  • Sainte Chapelle (0.4 mi / 0.7 km)
  • Palais Royal (0.5 mi / 0.9 km)

HOTEL_AMENITY.value: Limo or Town Car service available

ALTERNATIVE_PROPERTY_NAMES.qualifier: Novotel Paris Les Halles Hotel Paris
